title: Object - Convertible Issuance Transaction
description: Object describing convertible instrument issuance transaction by the issuer and held by a stakeholder

investment_amount.description: Amount invested and outstanding on date of issuance of this convertible

convertible_type.description: What kind of convertible instrument is this (of the supported, enumerated types)

conversion_triggers.title: Convertible - Conversion Trigger Array
conversion_triggers.description: In event the convertible can convert due to trigger events (e.g. Maturity, Next Qualified Financing, Change of Control, at Election of Holder), what are the terms?

pro_rata.description: What pro-rata (if any) is the holder entitled to buy at the next round?

seniority.description: If different convertible instruments have seniorty over one another, use this value to build a seniority stack, with 1 being highest seniority and equal seniority values assumed to be equal priority
